byline.contributor: Thomas Fuller reported from San Francisco, and Timothy Williams from New York.
byline.original: By THOMAS FULLER and TIMOTHY WILLIAMS

abstract: San Francisco Mayor Edwin M Lee announces he has asked for resignation of Police Chief Gregory P Suhr in wake of fatal shooting of black woman by police officer; is third killing in several months involving lethal force used by members of city's police force, which is under federal investigation based on race-based accusations of bias.
lead_paragraph: Police Chief Gregory P. Suhr was asked to resign after the third killing since December involving the police force.

headline.main: San Francisco Forces Out Police Chief After Officer Kills Black Woman
headline.print_headline: San Francisco Ousts Police Chief After New Killing

snippet: Police Chief Gregory P. Suhr was asked to resign after the third killing since December involving the police force.
